title: Activating blink light doesn't work.
content: Activating blink light for notifications in the system options and also in several apps like whatsapp, telegram, threema and so on doesn't have any effect. No led appears in any color. Notifications in lock screen are set to hide sensitive data. I have no clue what else to try. System is up to date android-version 9
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
